thread.title: Mary Tacheny
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Mary Tacheny

author: Mary Tacheny
title: Mary Tacheny
text: Thought I was ordering from a local florist near my relatives home. Nothing but problems with ordering process. Was on the phone over 1 1/2 hours through the day trying to get the delivery corrected. One call lasted 53 min. God bless one cust.service rep.She barely understood english, yet she tried to help. In the end it took three different supervisors to fix the problem. Flowers were great though.
